ygData.subject: Movie vs. Game
ygData.msgSnippet: Of course, FSGames could capitalize off the success of the movie.  If we expanded the list to take on the movie, as well, we couldn t advertise directly, but

Of course, FSGames could capitalize off the success of the movie.  If we expanded the list to take on the movie, as well, we couldn't advertise directly, but there's nothing wrong with the people-who-wanted-a-movie-list just reading emails about the game and wondering what that's all about.




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
